mapper.sql: id, name, description, is_private AS isPrivate, effective_time AS effectiveTime, expiry_time AS expiryTime, is_delete AS isDelete, create_time AS createTime, create_by AS createBy, update_time AS updateTime, update_by AS updateBy, tenant_id AS tenantId, create_by_name AS createByName, update_by_name AS updateByName, folder_id AS folderId, status, pic_group_id AS picGroupId
